results.title: Ameliorative effect of metformin on methotrexate-induced genotoxicity: An in vitro study in human cultured lymphocytes.
results.text_hl: The aim of the present study was to evaluate the genotoxic effect of @CHEMICAL_Methotrexate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008727 @@@methotrexate@@@ on DNA and the potential ameliorative effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Chromosome_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D025063 @@@chromosomal damage@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Methotrexate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008727 @@@methotrexate@@@.

citations.NLM: Rababa'H AM, Alzoubi KH, Khabour OF, Ababneh M. Ameliorative effect of metformin on methotrexate-induced genotoxicity: An in vitro study in human cultured lymphocytes. Biomed Rep. 2021 Jul;15(1):59. PMID: 34094535
